Craig ... bug seems back. Or, did it ever go away?

This bug has been around for a while (and has never gone away)  This is ugly,
but really doesn't cause any functional problems.  This root cause of this
problem occurs in the XSD model (owned by the EMF folks) but they don't intend
to fix this.  See bug 101245 for more detail. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 101245 ***

Hmm... good news.  With some convincing and creative patches from Keith the EMF
team has kindly decided to fix this problem.  So hopefully this issue will go
away soon.
